Sentencas: Biodiesel is considered as a renewable hydrogen source for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: This study contributes to a fundamental understanding of biodiesel autothermal reforming (ATR), which has not yet been widely explored in the open literature.
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel
Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: ATR is established as a baseline for this analysis.
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: This work applies a micro-soot meter based on a photo-acoustic method to quantify the condensed carbon from a single-tube reactor, and uses a mass spectrometer to measure the effluent gas composition under different operating conditions (reformer temperature, steam/carbon ratio, oxygen/carbon ratio, and gas hourly space velocity).
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: The key objective is to identify the optimum operating environment for biodiesel ATR with carbon-free deposition and peak hydrogen yield.
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: Thermodynamic analysis based on the method of total Gibbs free energy minimization is used to evaluate the equilibrium composition of effluent from the reformer.
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: The experimental investigations complimented with this theoretical analysis of biodiesel ATR enable effectively optimizing the onboard reforming conditions.
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel

Sentencas: This study is one component of a three-part investigation of bio-fuel reforming, also including fuel vaporization and reactant mixing (Part 1) and biodiesel diesel blends (Part 3).
Titulo: Bio-fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications. Part 2: Biodiesel
